name: Regology
headline: Regulatory compliance powered by AI
description: Our AI engine helps your organization understand applicable laws and follow them through a collaborative platform. The unique combination of software and regulatory content simplify the compliance burden.

founders.name: Mukund Goenka, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Compliance, banking and enterprise software experience prior to Regology.

## Regology Regulatory Intelligence Platform
Get more visibility and control with Regology. Our industry-agnostic regulatory intelligence platform quickly identifies all applicable regulatory content, monitors incoming changes, and generates obligations, risks, controls, and policies. The Regology platform enables compliance teams to automate manual tasks, anticipate changes in the regulatory landscape, and act effectively to ensure compliance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6643082428b4e7cea86701ea_automate.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/66430824d8af1d48e3af5b66_automate-hover.svg)
Regology provides the industry’s most advanced artificial intelligence (AI), including generative AI, to eliminate manual processes that inundate compliance teams, draining resources and time.
### Automate
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/667d033ae577972ae1275643_process-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6643082438ffb38b250b531a_anticipate-hover.svg)
Regology’s comprehensive regulatory change management solution and proprietary Smart Law Library enable compliance teams to track bills, laws, regulations, and agency updates in real-time to anticipate changes that will impact their business.
### Anticipate
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/664309ab902068b6372a1498_act-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/66446d6e6bb72c95107e7052_act-icon.svg)
Enable your team to effectively manage obligations, risks, controls, and policies, ensuring ongoing compliance with the latest laws and regulations. Seamlessly integrate with your existing GRC platforms, reinforcing your ability to act decisively.

## The Regology Platform
### Regulatory Change Management
Our AI-powered approach refines regulatory change management through automated tracking of the latest developments in laws and regulations—so you can forget about spreadsheets. Get a customized Smart Law Library that continuously tracks and updates relevant regulatory content in real time, adding efficiency and precision to your compliance programs.
[LEARN MORE](http://regology.com/</regulatory-change-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/66446764463de54bfd884dfc_alert.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6644676475c9cba167e040cd_Line%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6645b74a19aaadc1341b1e52_white-cta.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/664467916e946d0bb6d80825_view-cta.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6644676475c9cba167e040cd_Line%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/664b17a6ac018cd4984144f3_alert-written.svg)

### Compliance Management
With one view for all of your regulatory and compliance items, our AI platform helps you streamline policies, risks, and controls, enabling the implementation and effective testing of compliance programs. We seamlessly integrate with leading GRC partners to keep your operations optimal.‍
[LEARN MORE](http://regology.com/</compliance-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/667e8cad2dd0013f98e40fca_home-cm-2.webp)
## Give regulatory compliance a boost with Reggi!
This latest generative AI model is built on top of Regology, allowing users to ask natural language questions about their regulatory requirements—whether in one jurisdiction or multiple. Get citable, secure answers to a variety of queries about proposed rules and gazettes, legislative progression, the latest laws, agency updates, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6677a272689e2f763f67738d_hmr-heading.webp)
[Ask](http://regology.com/<#>)
[Learn how to write prompts](http://regology.com/</generative-ai-prompt-training>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6677a27237e56c11ebc3fb53_reggi-powered.svg)
## Core Benefits of Regology
Maximize your compliance impact and elevate your work quality with streamlined processes, automated regulatory change tracking, and efficient task management. Start reaping the benefits today!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6641c44c0b1a6f2c2edc87a9_process-icon.svg)
### Process Efficiencies
Replace multiple spreadsheets with one platform and automate resource-draining tasks, like manual tracking. Integrate with internal GRC systems and expand easily into new jurisdictions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6641c44c2b531df61b309cea_risk-icon.svg)
### Risk & Cost Reduction
Mitigate non-compliance risks, avoid penalties, and reduce reliance on costly consultants. Save billable hours with automation, redirecting efforts of multiple full-time employees doing one job.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663379b068243e81cd1bd4fd/6641c44c9a6c20a90d8ddd52_work%20quality.svg)
### Higher Work Quality
Free up your team to spend more time on ahead-of-the-curve work and prioritize proactivity with foresight over hindsight. Enable consistency and transparency with fast reporting.
## Easy, StraightforwardOnboarding

### 1. Set Up a Smart Law Library**™**
You have options! Either choose from our selection of law libraries, each carefully curated to suit specific needs, or import your own. Most companies have their law libraries built out in static databases and spreadsheets; you can quickly upload them into Regology, and the platform will process your law library.
### 2. Get Direct Access to Regulatory Intelligence
Start receiving timely notifications and alerts to benefit from our regulatory intelligence without delay. Receive custom alerts for final and upcoming changes in your newly set law library, and explore them with your new generative AI assistant, Reggi.
### 3. Customize What’s Important
Your organization’s needs are unique. Customize the type of alerts you want to receive and who should they be sent to within your organization for proper checks and balances.
### 4. Expand When Needed
As your business evolves, easily update your Smart Law Library to stay aligned with your growing requirements. Plus, our expert team at Regology is here to assist you every step of the way and ensure your library is properly maintained!

## Regology Regulatory Intelligence Platform
Get more visibility and control with Regology. Our industry-agnostic regulatory intelligence platform quickly identifies all applicable regulatory content, monitors incoming changes, and generates obligations, risks, controls, and policies. The Regology platform enables compliance teams to automate manual tasks, anticipate changes in the regulatory landscape, and act effectively to ensure compliance.

generated_description:
### Regology: Simplifying Regulatory Compliance with AI

**Overview**  
Regology is a Palo Alto-based company founded in 2017, gaining its initial momentum as part of Y Combinator’s S18 batch. With a team of 54 talented individuals, the company harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to streamline regulatory compliance for businesses across various industries.

**Mission**  
At the core of Regology's operations is the mission to simplify regulatory compliance with AI-driven solutions. Their platform helps organizations not only to understand the laws that apply to them but also to track and comply with these regulations efficiently.

**What They Do**  
Regology started with an AI engine that helps organizations identify applicable laws and a collaborative platform that alleviates the compliance burden. Their unique blend of software and regulatory content sets them apart in making compliance less of a headache for businesses. The platform encompasses:
- **Regulatory Change Management:** Provides automated tracking of updates in laws and regulations.
- **Compliance Management:** Develops workflows ensuring adherence to necessary regulations.

**Key Features**  
- **Generative AI Assistant (Reggi):** Users can interact naturally with the platform, asking questions about their compliance requirements across different jurisdictions.
- **Smart Law Library:** A proprietary library that tracks and updates relevant legal content in real time.
